item.value: An AuthenticationFilter that is capable of automatically performing an authentication attempt * based on the incoming request.
能够根据传入的请求自动执行认证尝试*。

Returns this Subject's application-wide uniquely identifying principal, or {@code null} if this * Subject is anonymous because it doesn't yet have any associated account data (for example, * if they haven't logged in).
